subject: RE: [junit] how to test JSP pages
msgSnippet: First you have to decide just what you want to test on the JSP. Personally, I use HtmlFixture. It s part of FitNesse. www.fitnesse.org. ... Robert S. Koss,
messageBody:
First you have to decide just what you want to test on the JSP.

Personally, I use HtmlFixture. It's part of FitNesse. www.fitnesse.org.


---
Robert S. Koss, Ph.D.
Senior Consultant
www.objectmentor.com
